Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
cash and equivalents excluding assets held for sale
Prepaid and Other Current Assets: assets held for sale at carrying value
assets of disposal group including discontinued operation current
contract with customer asset net current
Receivables: notes and loans receivable net current
premiums and other receivables net current

Other Non-Current Assets: contract and other deferred assets noncurrent
disposal group including discontinued operation assets noncurrent
operating lease right of use asset
restricted cash and cash equivalents noncurrent

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss available for sale securities adjustment net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss cumulative changes in net gain loss from cash flow hedges effect net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss foreign currency translation adjustment net of tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax

Deferred Revenue: contract with customer liability progress billings
Other Current Liabilities: liabilities of assets held for sale
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation current

Long-term Debt: long term debt and capital lease obligations
non recourse borrowings of consolidated securitization entities
Other Non-Current Liabilities: investment contracts insurance liabilities annuity benefits
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation noncurrent

__unmapped__: accounts payable and other accrued liabilities current
assets of disposal group including discontinued operation
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents
liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation
property plant and equipment and operating lease right of use asset after accumulated depreciation and amortization
redeemable noncontrolling interest equity carrying amount
